journey.name: Dashboard Journey
journey.description: A Journey that tests the user flow on the dashboard screen

actions.action: Click on the Explore menu item, which can either be on the bottom of the screen (for compact window size classes) or on the left (on medium and expanded window size classes)
If the Explore screen is displayed, keep waiting until there are visible posters with images for the Popular Shows and "Trending Shows" headings displayed on the screen
If the Explore screen is displayed, verify that there is a list of poster images under a heading "Trending Shows".
If the Explore screen is displayed, click on the first poster displayed under the "Trending Shows" heading
Verify that clicking on the poster image under the "Trending Shows" heading results in the detail page for that same show title being displayed.
If the detail page is being loaded, keep waiting until two images are fully displayed
If the detail page is displayed, verify that the name of the show appears in the top bar as well as above the poster.
If the detail page is displayed, click on the back arrow at the top of the detail screen
Verify that clicking on the back arrow from the detail page for the selected show dismisses the detail page for that selected show
If the Explore screen is displayed, scroll to the "Popular Shows" heading. Verify that there are a list of posters displayed under the "Popular Shows" heading
If on the Explore screen, click on one of the shows under the "Popular Shows" heading
Verify that clicking on the poster image under the "Popular Shows" heading results in the detail page for that same show title being displayed.
If the detail page is being loaded, keep waiting until two images are fully displayed
If the detail page is displayed, verify that the name of the show appears in the top bar as well as above the poster.
If the detail page is displayed, click on the back arrow at the top of the detail screen
If the Explore screen is displayed, scroll to the bottom of the screen "Most Anticipated Shows" heading
Verify that there is a heading with "Most Anticipated Shows" text displayed with a list of poster images underneath it
Click the back arrow at the top of the screen
